properties.areaDesc: Shelby, AL; Elmore, AL; Talladega, AL; Chilton, AL; Coosa, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 1:28PM CST until February 9 at 1:12PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Coosa River At Childersburg Affecting Chilton...Coosa...Elmore...
Shelby and Talladega Counties.

.Rises are occurring on the Coosa River following recent heavy
rainfall...and a flood warning is now in effect for the Coosa River
at Childersburg.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Coosa River At Childersburg.
* until Sunday afternoon...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 12:45 PM Friday The stage Was 401.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 402 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by late this afternoon and
continue to rise to near 402.6 feet by Saturday morning. The river
will fall below flood stage by early Sunday morning.
* Impact...At 402 feet...Flooding of low lying areas begins. At 404
feet flooding of some low lying roads in the area begins...and the
yards of some homes near the river become flooded.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
